The clinical trial include 40 child divide two group : child spasticity dystonia due cerebral palsy , child spasticity dystonia due genetic neurodegenerative disease . Each group randomly divide two arm receive Avidekel cannabis oil 6-to-1 ratio CBD THC enrich Avidekel cannabis oil 20-to-1 ratio CBD THC . During study , various variable collect include : medication intake , spasticity , dystonia score , pain scale , restlessness scale , quality life measure , safety test , side effect , addiction test . The investigator hypothesize cannabis consumption reduce dystonia spasticity child motor disability relate genetic neurodegenerative disease cerebral palsy result improve motor function , non-motor function quality life .
